data.message: COULD SOMEONE MESSAGE ME PLEASE. IM HAVING ISSUES

replies.message: Hi there, Montana. How can we help? -Jordan
Hey Montana. This is a great place to ask a question. Let us know if there's anything we can assist you with. -Jordan

i have a friend who is getting bullied and harassed. the woman is sharing her picture saying aweful things about her. when my friend reported it she got blocked from commenting or posting for 24hrs without warning. for one i want to know why nothing is being done about the harassment and bullying and 2 why was my friends account locked? she did nothing wrong. recieved no warnings. she just wants the woman to delete her pics and to leave her alone but thats not happening and now the woman is harassing her friends and family. they have all reported her and still nothing is done

she has followed all the procedures for reporting and when she gets the reports back it states nothing wrong was found? i dont understand how that can be when she is saying aweful things and the pics arent hers to begin with. how can facebook not see the wrong this woman is doing?
i too have reported the pics and posts to no avail. says it didnt violate community standards? how??? thats my friend being attacked!

Thanks for reaching out to us, Montana. Because of the diversity of our community, it's possible that something could be disagreeable to you without violating our Terms. For this reason, we offer personal controls over what you see in News Feed. You are free to hide or quietly unfriend or unfollow those people, Pages or apps that upset you. Facebook also offers tools to help you deal with bullying and harassment. Learn more about these controls and our community standards here: http://bit.ly/1Re8TBy. -Jordan

its disagreeable to more people than just myself!!! at least 20 people have reported her account and post and nothing has happened! we have all filled out all the right reports and still nadda! MY FRIEND JUST WANTS THE PERSON TO DELETE HER PICTURE AND LEAVE US ALONE! WHY IS NOTHING BEING DONE?
